00018 #ifndef __VOTCA_KMC_SINGLE_H
00019 #define __VOTCA_KMC_SINGLE_H

00021 #include <votca/kmc/vssmgroup.h>
00022 #include <vector>
00023 #include <map>
00024 #include <iostream>

00028 #include <votca/tools/tokenizer.h>
00029 using namespace std;
00030 using namespace votca::kmc;
00031 
00032 struct link_t;
00033 
00034 class node_t : public VSSMGroup<link_t> {
00035   public:
00036         node_t(int id)
00037           : _id(id), _occ(0) {}
00038         double _occ;
00039         int _id;
00040 
00041         void onExecute() {
00042                 _occ+=WaitingTime();
00043                 VSSMGroup<link_t>::onExecute();
00044         }
00045 };
00046 
00047 node_t *current;
00048 vec r(0,0,0);
00049 
00050 struct link_t {
00051         link_t(node_t *dest, double rate, vec r)
00052         : _dest(dest), _rate(rate), _r(r) {}
00053         double Rate() {
00054                 return _rate;
00055         }
00056 
00057         void onExecute() {
00058                 r+=_r;
00059                 current = _dest;
00060         }
00061         double _rate;
00062         node_t *_dest;
00063         vec _r;
00064 };
00065 
00066 class KMCSingle : public KMCCalculator 
00067 {
00068 public:
00069     KMCSingle() {};
00070    ~KMCSingle() {};
00071 
00072     void Initialize(const char *filename, Property *options );
00073     bool EvaluateFrame();
00074 
00075 protected:
00076             void LoadGraph();
00077             void RunKMC(void);
00078             void WriteOcc(void);
00079 
00080             map<int , node_t *> _nodes_lookup;
00081             vector<node_t *> _nodes;
00082             map<int , node_t *> _injection_lookup;
00083             vector<node_t *> _injection;
00084             string _injection_name;
00085             double _runtime;
00086             double _dt;
00087             int _seed;
00088             string _filename; // HACK
00089 };
00090 
00091 void KMCSingle::Initialize(const char *filename, Property *options )
00092 {
00093         if (options->exists("options.kmcsingle.runtime")) {
00094             _runtime = options->get("options.kmcsingle.runtime").as<double>();
00095         }
00096         else {
00097             std::runtime_error("Error in kmcsingle: total run time is not provided");
00098         }
00099 
00100         if (options->exists("options.kmcsingle.outputtime")) {
00101             _dt = options->get("options.kmcsingle.outputtime").as<double>();
00102         }
00103         else {
00104             std::runtime_error("Error in kmcsingle: output frequency is not provided");
00105         }
00106 
00107         if (options->exists("options.kmcsingle.seed")) {
00108             _seed = options->get("options.kmcsingle.seed").as<int>();
00109         }
00110         else {
00111             std::runtime_error("Error in kmcsingle: seed is not provided");
00112         }
00113         
00114         if (options->exists("options.kmcsingle.injection")) {
00115             _injection_name = options->get("options.kmcsingle.injection").as<string>();
00116         }
00117         else {
00118             std::runtime_error("Error in kmcsingle: injection pattern is not provided");
00119         }
00120         
00121         _filename = filename;
00122 
00123        //cout << _seed << endl;
00124        srand(_seed);
00125        votca::tools::Random::init(rand(), rand(), rand(), rand());
00126 
00127 }
00128 
00129 bool KMCSingle::EvaluateFrame()
00130 {
00131 
00132     LoadGraph();
00133     RunKMC();
00134     return true;
00135 }
00136 
00137 void KMCSingle::LoadGraph() {
00138 
00139     Database db;
00140     db.Open( _filename );
00141     cout << " Loading graph from " << _filename << endl;
00142     Statement *stmt = db.Prepare("SELECT _id,name FROM conjsegs;");
00143 
00144     while (stmt->Step() != SQLITE_DONE) {
00145         int id = stmt->Column<int>(0);
00146         string name = stmt->Column<string>(1);
00147         node_t *n =new node_t(id);
00148         _nodes.push_back(n);
00149         _nodes_lookup[id] = _nodes.back();
00150         if (wildcmp(_injection_name.c_str(), name.c_str())) {
00151             _injection.push_back(n);
00152             _injection_lookup[id] = _injection.back();
00153         }
00154     }
00155     //delete stmt;
00156     cout << "  -Nodes: " << _nodes.size() << endl;
00157     cout << "  -Injection Points: " << _injection.size() << endl;
00158 
00159     delete stmt;
00160 
00161     int links = 0;
00162     stmt = db.Prepare("SELECT conjseg1, conjseg2, rate12, rate21, r_x, r_y, r_z FROM pairs;");
00163     while (stmt->Step() != SQLITE_DONE) {
00164         node_t *n1 = _nodes_lookup[stmt->Column<int>(0)];
00165         node_t *n2 = _nodes_lookup[stmt->Column<int>(1)];
00166         double rate12 = stmt->Column<double>(2);
00167         double rate21 = stmt->Column<double>(3);
00168         vec r = vec(stmt->Column<double>(4), stmt->Column<double>(5), stmt->Column<double>(6));
00169         n1->AddEvent(new link_t(n2, rate12, r));
00170         n2->AddEvent(new link_t(n1, rate21, -r));
00171         links += 2;
00172     }
00173     delete stmt;
00174     cout << "  -Links: " << links << endl;
00175 
00176 }
00177 
00178 void KMCSingle::RunKMC(void)
00179 {
00180 
00181         double t = 0;
00182 
00183         srand(_seed);
00184         votca::tools::Random::init(rand(), rand(), rand(), rand());
00185 
00186         // cout << " seed:size:site " << _seed << ":" << _injection.size() << ":" << Random::rand_uniform_int(_injection.size()) << endl;
00187         current=_injection[Random::rand_uniform_int(_injection.size())];
00188         cout <<" Starting simulation at node: "<<current->_id-1<<endl;
00189         double next_output = _dt;
00190     int i=0;
00191     while(t<_runtime) {
00192         t+=current->WaitingTime();
00193                 current->onExecute();
00194         if(t > next_output) {
00195                 next_output = t + _dt;
00196                 cout << t << ": " << r << endl;
00197         }
00198     }
00199     _runtime = t;
00200     WriteOcc();
00201     cout << std::scientific << "\nKMC run finished\nAverage velocity (m/s): " << r/t*1e-9 << endl;
00202 }
00203 
00204 void KMCSingle::WriteOcc()
00205 {
00206     Database db;
00207     cout << "Opening for writing " << _filename << endl;
00208         db.Open(_filename);
00209         db.Exec("BEGIN;");
00210         Statement *stmt = db.Prepare("UPDATE conjsegs SET occ = ? WHERE _id = ?;");
00211         for(int i=0; i<_nodes.size(); ++i) {
00212                 stmt->Reset();
00213                 stmt->Bind(1, _nodes[i]->_occ/_runtime);
00214                 stmt->Bind(2, _nodes[i]->_id);
00215                 stmt->Step();
00216         }
00217         db.Exec("END;");
00218         delete stmt;
00219 }
